notes: Healthcare vertical, strict compliance requirements. Needs SOC2 documentation before expanding usage. Currently on basic plan.
Fintech startup, Series B. Using our platform for fraud detection pipeline. Very technical team, files detailed bug reports.
Retail chain, 200+ stores. Rolled out to 3 pilot locations. Positive feedback from store managers but IT team wants SSO integration.
Education nonprofit, got in through our community program. Low revenue but strong case study potential. Using NLP features creatively.
Government contractor, long procurement cycle. Finally signed after 8 months. Needs air-gapped deployment option eventually.
Marketing agency, manages 12 client accounts on our platform. Biggest concern is multi-tenant reporting. Pays on time, rarely contacts support.
E-commerce company, peak season coming up. Asked about autoscaling and rate limits. Last year had an outage during Black Friday.
